name: Jon Whack
description:
Using the one thing meant to stop you, Whack, Fly, and Throw your way through the Syndicate Headquarters on a quest to refund your stolen hot sauce.

In an attempt to capture you the Syndicate have attached a metal ball to you, giving you the ultimate weapon, throw the ball to launch yourself, swing from magnets, and smack some bad guys through windows. You are Jon Whack.

Oh yeah, and the Syndicate is not happy about it, and will employ all the audio bugs to stop you

Controls :

WASD - Move

Mouse - Look

Left mouse - Throw, reel in ball

Left Ctrl - Slide

Extra Controls :

E - Grab other objects

Space - Jump

R - Respawn

After the jam end i will upload a post-jam version with some fixes, improvements to the shader, and fix the flashing lights issue
